value:
Ephraim is strong, and he cuts a
dashing figure. When it comes to
his studies, though...$k$pOf course, he did rely on my help for
that. I was very glad to aid him.

My kingdom, Grado, can be a harsh
and inhospitable place. Still, I do love
my homeland.

You work so hard, but I want you to
know that—if you need to—it's OK to
cry.$k$pNobody here knows what you've
been through but you.

I am useless with a sword. Eirika
disarms me so quickly... It's really
an embarrassment.

I tripped just a moment ago. My leg
still hurts, but it hasn't ruined my
mood in the slightest.$k$pIt's strange. Being alive is wonderful,
isn't it?

I am Lyon. I am glad to meet you,
$Nu.$k$pMay my visit sustain your friendship
with $Nf.

Something rises from deep within
me. With this, I can be of aid...

I think I've progressed a little.
Yes, I'm certain of it.

I cannot remain despondent...
I will redeem myself.

No books have taught me of
power like this. I'm glad of this
strength, but...a little scared.

It is good to meet you. I am Lyon,
prince of Grado. I hope that we can
become friends.

To tell the truth...some of my
memories from before I came to this
world...are lost.$k$pIt's all so indistinct, as though a fog
has been cast on them. And other
things, I can't remember at all...$k$pI feel like I may have done some
things that would make the people
dear to me so very sad.$k$pOh, $Nu...$k$pYou are far too kind. Please don't
look at me so. I want to see you
smile. Always.$k$pI had friends back home who worried
about me just as you do... Dear friends.$k$pEphraim, Eirika... I hope that someday,
we can gather together for a good,
long chat.
はっ！
いくよ…
うああっ！
いけない…
I am the Demon King.
No one will stand in my way.
Well, come then.
My caring heart has died.
Ephraim... Eirika...
あはは
Death was coming for us all. I just wanted to save everyone.
Do not attempt to startle me.
Ephraim is strong. I have always admired him...
Eirika is so kind. Even to someone like me...
The weight of the crown...is immense.
Where... Where did I go wrong?
I have no right to be alive... But I shall remain here for as long as you wish.
Yes?
What's next?
You lead, I follow.
